name: uncynical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
believing that people are interested in other people and are sincere: He is unspoilt and uncynical, whereas I'm cynical to the core. Her mother taught her to be uncynical about love.
More examplesFewer examplesThe uncynical view is: why should the government be criticized for producing a white paper that makes everyone happy?He's remarkably uncynical about people, and if he thinks you're a good person, he'll forgive all your mistakes.She's very down-to-earth, and oddly uncynical for a comedian.
